metadata.title: CVE-2017-6962 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in apng2gif 1.7. There is an integer overflow resulting in a heap-based buffer overflow. This is related to the read_chunk function making an unchecked addition of 12.

criterions.comment: apng2gif package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8-0.1').
